Banner.name: JIHYEON JEONG.
Banner.tagline: I build things for the web.
Banner.description: Lifelong learner with a pragmatic mindset and a passion for technology. Web developer with over 5 years of experience in software development and 6 years in the IT industry.

About.intro: Hello! My name is Jihyeon Jeong and I enjoy coding and creating values from them. I've been working since 2019 in web development when I decided to become a professional frontend developer. Since then, I have consistently pursued learning opportunities and applied my knowledge to create exceptional services.
About.adaptability: I believe I can adopt any tech stacks in a timely manner to meet the requirements of any development organization. As a frontend developer, I am confident in my versatility and adaptability.
About.techListIntro: Here are a few technologies I have been working with recently:

Experiences.exp1Content: Maintained and developed new features for After10Months, a pregnancy tracking app built with React Native. Focused primarily on
Experiences.exp2Content: Wrote robust, maintainable code for medical exam management web apps in collaboration with medical colleges such as Chonnam and Pusan. Shared knowledge and actively discussed modern web architecture with team members and stakeholders.
Experiences.exp3Content: Full stack development on place-suggesting live service product Focusing from planning DB schema to implementing adequate mobile app UI structure. Provided leadership with team toward same goal, 'Get things done' achieving launching new services and features with timely manner,s including
Experiences.exp3Hightlight: Child ID card, User content forum system, Place-suggesting feature
Experiences.exp3ContentSecond: through Bigdata collection powered by Google Bigquery and various collaboration features with 밴더스터, 더핑크퐁컴퍼니, 한화생명 and more.
Experiences.exp4Content: Developed, maintained E-commerce app and web app.

Projects.project1Content: Pregnancy week calculation, weekly fetal growth report, parenting growth and development check, fever management, pregnancy probability check, etc. An essential diary for expectant mothers.
Projects.project2Content: An patient information generator and medical-exam manager powered
Projects.project2ContentSecond: engine. Refactoring Jquery codebase to modern features such as Service Worker, Centralized state management, WebRTC, WebSocket and much more.
Projects.project3Content: Hybrid mobile app project for visualizing personalized places to visit for family. Creating ID card for children and getting recommended top places via big data, user reviews, recently popular places and detailed info uploaded by business owner themselves.
Projects.project4Content: Hybrid E-commerce mobile app and web app. Show featured products categorized by brand, show mualizing personalized places to visit for family. Creating ID card for children and getting recommended top places via big data, user reviews, recently popular places and detailed info uploaded by business owner themselves.
Projects.project5Content: This is a side project I'm currently developing, themed after Windows 95. My goal is to implement various programs on the web, with window management handled via React-Rnd and react context.
